subject: Sexual Health
title: Hormonal Changes with Age
description: One-minute skill: Hormonal Changes with Age.

hook.text: Hormones don't stay constant. After peaking in early adulthood, they gradually shift and decline.

buildup.text: Women experience menopause around age 50 when ovaries stop releasing eggs and estrogen drops sharply.

discovery.text: Men see a gradual testosterone decline of about 1% per year after age 30, sometimes called andropause.

twist.text: Hormonal decline doesn't mean the end of health. Many people thrive with proper care and awareness.

climax.text: Understanding these changes helps people make informed choices about their health as they age.

punchline.text: Hormones change with age. Knowledge helps you adapt.
